description:
Echo lake is across the mouth of the squamish river. It is an amazing hike 
alongside some amazing waterfalls that have carved their way onto the 
granite. There where some wasps when we went so beware !
directions:
Echo lake is across the mouth of the squamish river.  Follow signs to the 
windsurfing access road. Once eyou reach the dyke alongside the river, drive 
500m and park your car. There are several good places to launch your boat 
for the short trip across the river. There is a small back channel with some old 
pilings. Pull your boat well out of the water as this is a tidal area.  
Alternatively Squamishriverjet.ca can take you across for a fee.
title: Echo Lake
